name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deal Hunter Pro: Deals, Comparisons, Tracking

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and track great deals and lower prices with Deal Hunter Pro.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search over 1 billion products! We've scoured the internet, so you don't have to.

ðŸŽ¯  COMPARISON SHOPPING: While you are shopping your favorite products, if multiple merchants are selling the same product, our Comparison Shopping automatically notifies you to compare prices across all merchants, ensuring you find the best deal.

ðŸŽ¯  ONE STOP PRODUCT DISCOVERY: Manually search for any product by Name, UPC, ASIN, Make/Model, Brand or Keyword across thousands of other merchants such as Amazon, Walmart and more!

ðŸŽ¯  PRICE TRACKER: Our innovative Deal Hunt feature allows you to set a price and get notified via email when the product matches or drops below the desired price at any merchant.

ðŸŽ¯  DEALS GALORE:  We bring the deals directly to you.  If the merchant website you are on has a deal running, we will automatically notify you so you don't miss out.  You can also check out our Deals tab to see the top deals of the week from all our merchants.

ðŸŽ¯  DAILY DATABASE UPDATES: Our database of 1B+ products is updated daily to ensure the latest, most accurate information. 

* Currently available in the United States only
* By installing this Chrome extension, you agree to Deal Hunter Pro's Terms & Conditions (https://www.dealhunterpro.com/terms)
